channel.title: Item To Object [PI] Rep++
channel.description: How can i make it so when you equip an item that you turn into an object? I will rep if your's works.

item.title: Item To Object [PI] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

if(wearID == ITEM_CODE) { c.npcId2 = 2626; c.isNpc = true; c.getPA().requestUpdates(); }

2626 = ring of stone rock btw

Read full topic

item.title: Item To Object [PI] Rep++
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=abatssk8ter link=topic=467287.msg3416891#msg3416891 date=1291163721]

[quote author=I Vain I link=topic=467287.msg3416825#msg3416825 date=1291160064]
PNPC method. ^.^

The rock is an NPC.
[/quote]A rock isn’t an npc, it’s an object… and i’ve never heard of a po (playerobject) command.
[/quote]The rock used in Ring of Stone is definitely an NPC.[/quote]

It is an NPC. Look through your npc.cfg and see; just clarifying.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Nathan8888 wrote:

Not sure as I don’t have experience with that stuff, because it’s stupid imo.[/quote]
